meaningMnemonic: Social commentary aside, the <radical>white</radical> <radical>king</radical> is the king that wears all white. Traditionally, this is someone better than a king. The <kanji>emperor</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: Who is the <kanji>emperor</kanji>? It is <reading>こう</reading>いち. こういち the emperor stands over his subjects.
